verses.text: And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* made \w affinity|strong="H2859"\w* with \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* her into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, until he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w building|strong="H1129"\w* his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Only the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* in high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, because there was no \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, until those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w walking|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: only he \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* and burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in high \w places|strong="H1116"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* there; for \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \add was\add* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*: a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* upon that \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

¶ In \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* in a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* what I shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou hast \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, according as he \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, and in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and in \w uprightness|strong="H3483"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* with thee; and thou hast \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* for him this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*, that thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft mercy: or, bounty\f*

And now, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou hast made thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* instead of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and I \add am but\add* a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*: I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not \add how\add* to go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* or come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*.

And thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which thou hast \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that cannot be \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w* nor \w counted|strong="H5608"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* therefore thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* an \w understanding|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that I may \w discern|strong="H0995"\w* between \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*: for who is \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* this thy so \w great|strong="H3515"\w* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?\f + \fr 3.9 \ft understanding: Heb. hearing\f*
And the \w speech|strong="H1697"\w* \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Because thou hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, and hast not \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* for thyself \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*; neither hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* for thyself, nor hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* the \w life|strong="H5315"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; but hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* for thyself \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* to \w discern|strong="H8085"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*;\f + \fr 3.11 \ft long life: Heb. many days\f*\f + \fr 3.11 \ft discern: Heb. hear\f*

Behold, I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according to thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: lo, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* and an \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; so that there was none like thee \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, neither \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee shall any \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* like unto thee.

And I have also \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee that which thou hast not \w asked|strong="H7592"\w*, both \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*: so that there shall not be \w any|strong="H0376"\w* among the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* like unto thee all thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft shall…: or, hath not been\f*

And if thou wilt \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, as thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* did \w walk|strong="H1980"\w*, then I will \w lengthen|strong="H0748"\w* thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w awoke|strong="H3364"\w*; and, behold, \add it was\add* a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*. And he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and offered \w up|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H6213"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* to all his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* there \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \add that were\add* \w harlots|strong="H2181"\w*, unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0994"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, I and this \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and I was delivered of a \w child|strong="H3205"\w* with her in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And it came to pass the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* after that I was \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w*, that this \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* was \w delivered|strong="H3205"\w* also: and we \add were\add* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; \add there was\add* no \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* with us in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w save|strong="H2108"\w* we \w two|strong="H8147"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
And this \w woman’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; because she \w overlaid|strong="H7901"\w* it.

And she \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* at \w midnight|strong="H8432"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* from \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* me, while thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w slept|strong="H3463"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* it in her \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* her \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* in my \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

And when I \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* to give my \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \w suck|strong="H3243"\w*, behold, it was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: but when I had \w considered|strong="H0995"\w* it in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, behold, it was not my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, which I did \w bear|strong="H3205"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay; but the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \add is\add* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add is\add* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. And this \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No; but the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add is\add* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \add is\add* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. Thus they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, The \w one|strong="H2063"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, and thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*: and the \w other|strong="H2063"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay; but thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, and my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H3947"\w* me a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Divide|strong="H1504"\w* the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* in \w two|strong="H8147"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* to the \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* to the \w other|strong="H0259"\w*.

Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* whose the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, for her \w bowels|strong="H7356"\w* \w yearned|strong="H3648"\w* upon her \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w O|strong="H0994"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* her the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w child|strong="H3205"\w*, and in no \w wise|strong="H4191"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* it. But the other \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let it be neither mine nor thine, \add but\add* \w divide|strong="H1504"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 3.26 \ft yearned: Heb. were hot\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* her the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w child|strong="H3205"\w*, and in no \w wise|strong="H4191"\w* \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* it: she \add is\add* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* thereof.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* of the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* which the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w judged|strong="H8199"\w*; and they \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the \w king|strong="H6440"\w*: for they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add* in \w him|strong="H7130"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 3.28 \ft in him: Heb. in the midst of him\f*
